# colorAttachmentMappingState

**Instance Property**

Configures a logical-to-physical rendering remap state.

## Declaration

```swift
var colorAttachmentMappingState: MTL4LogicalToPhysicalColorAttachmentMappingState { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to assign how a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4RenderCommandEncoder] instance maps the output of your fragment shader to physical color attachments.
